        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Interior Design Project</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Innenarchitektur-Projekt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet de Conception Intérieure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto Do Projeto Interior</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto Di Disegno Interno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εσωτερικό πρόγραμμα σχεδίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proyecto Del Diseño Interior</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Within this lesson, students will role play the job of an interior designer.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Innerhalb dieser Lektion willen Kursteilnehmer 
Rolle Spiel der Job eines Innenarchitekten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants veulent le jeu 
de rôle le travail d'un dessinateur d'intérieurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dentro desta lição, os estudantes querem o jogo 
do papel o trabalho de um desenhador interior.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">All'interno di questa lezione, gli allievi 
vogliono il gioco di ruolo il lavoro di un architetto arredatore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέσα σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές ρόλος θα 
παίξουν την εργασία ενός εσωτερικού σχεδιαστή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dentro de esta lección, los estudiantes quieren 
el juego del papel el trabajo de un diseñador interior.</string>
          </description>
